name: TSOL: Edge World
description:
TSOL: Edge World is an Indie 2d Metroidvania Platformer. 

This game's setting is around a space station orbiting a mysterious planet, this space station and corperation's goals are the research and development of experimental biological substances to help cure and benefit humans back on earth. (something tells me that everything might not go according to plan. . .)

The Space Discovery Foundation (SDF) is a corporation shrouded in mystery and wealth, they are the group in control of the space station that you will be assigned to protect and investigate, the fate of this mission rests in your hands. . .

Please know that the downloads for this game project currently are very early development, game play mechanics only no story, enemies, collectables, etc. Just simple menus, player spawning, jumping, and shooting

Thank you for your understanding, and I look forward to making this game epic the more I add to it!

(Listing the Controls here because I didn't add the tutorial key maps yet XD)

W,A,S,D | Arrow Keys to move

Spacebar to jump

Alt | Shift to Shoot
